condition_studied: effect of alum on the immune response to rPA
description: Four groups of 12 mice will each be immunized with rPA ± Alum (alhydrogel).  Two groups will then be boosted on Day 227 with rPA alone.  Mice will be bled every 2-3 days over the course of 283 days.  Serum samples will be prepared and assayed for anti-PA titers using ELISA and/or anthrax toxin neutralization assays.
endpoints: Mice were sacrificed at designated time points. ELISA assays were done on serum collected from the mice.
intervention_agent: rPA or rPA+Alum, with or without boost
objectives: To comprehensively study the humoral response to immunization with rPA with or without Alum using in vitro antibody analyses.
